hero.title: Arques Club Castelldefels
hero.subtitle: Precision and Tradition
hero.description: Archery club in Castelldefels with over 25 years of experience. Join our community of Catalan archers and discover the ancient art of competitive archery.
hero.detailedDescription: We offer archer training courses, specialized coaching in recurve and compound bows, and activities for all ages. From beginners to Olympic competitors, we develop your technique in the sport of archery.

courses.title: Training Courses
courses.description: Learn archery from scratch with certified instructors

location.title: Castelldefels Location
location.description: Shooting range equipped with the latest technology in Catalonia

community.title: Archers Community
community.description: Join tournaments, competitions and archery activities in Barcelona

about.title: Arques Club Castelldefels
about.subtitle: Archery Club in Catalonia since 1998
about.description1: Arques Club Castelldefels is a competitive archery club located in Castelldefels, Barcelona, with over 25 years of experience in archer training and archery practice in Catalonia.
about.description2: We offer archery courses for beginners and specialized training in recurve and compound bows. Our instructors certified by the Catalan Archery Federation guarantee quality training in the Olympic sport of archery.

features.certifiedDescription: Trainers with international certification and years of experience
features.facilitiesDescription: Recurve bow, compound bow, traditional and field archery

programs.title: Archery Courses and Programs
programs.subtitle: We offer archer training courses and specialized programs in recurve and compound bows for all ages, from archery initiation to competitive sports in Castelldefels, Barcelona.

beginner.title: Beginner Archery Course
beginner.description: 8-week basic archer training course designed for beginners. Learn the fundamental techniques of competitive archery, safety rules and professional handling of archery equipment.

intermediate.title: Specialized Training
intermediate.description: Advanced program for experienced archers looking to improve their technique and participate in official competitions.

youth.title: Youth Archery
youth.description: Special program designed for children and youth, focused on developing skills and values through the sport of archery.

cta.notFound: Can't find the program you're looking for?

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Interested in becoming part of Arques Club Castelldefels? Contact us for more information about our archery courses.

footer.description: Arques Club Castelldefels is your archery club in Catalonia. Join our community of archers and discover the passion for the sport of archery.

accessibility.scrollDown: Scroll down to see more content

seo.metaTitle: Arques Club Castelldefels - Archery Club in Catalonia | Courses and Training
seo.metaDescription: Archery club in Castelldefels with over 25 years of experience. Training courses, specialized coaching and activities for all ages. Discover archery in Catalonia!
